Jii Coro Comic: A Dangerous Jiisan webisode released on CoroCoro Comic's official youtube page for Christmas 2015. In it, Yousuke accidentally breaks Jiisan's handheld game and ends up going on a wacky time traveling loop to fix it.
['Zettai Zetsumei Dangerous Jiisan (2005)', '40 Shuunen Da yo!! CoroCoro All-Star Shougakkou']
